mapper.select: SELECT COM_CODE , COM_CODE_GRP , COM_CODE_NM , COM_CODE_DESC , USE_YN , COM_CODE_SEQ , UPPER_CODE_GRP , UPPER_COM_CODE FROM COM_CODE WHERE COM_CODE_GRP = #{comCodeGrp}

WITH SCDU AS ( SELECT * FROM COM_CODE WHERE COM_CODE_GRP = 'SEC010' ) SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY SAS.SCHAFS_BEGIN_DATE) ID, SC.COM_CODE_NM AS title, SAS.SCHAFS_BEGIN_DATE "start", TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SAS.SCHAFS_END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')+1,'YYYY-MM-DD') end, 'true' allDay, '#ffd9b4' backgroundColor, '#000' textColor, SUBSTR(SAS.SEMSTR_SE, 1, 4) || '년도 ' || SUBSTR(SAS.SEMSTR_SE, 5, 1) || '학기' AS SEMSTR_SE FROM SCHOOL_AFFAIRS_SCHEDULE SAS INNER JOIN SCDU SC ON (SC.COM_CODE = SAS.SCDU_SE)

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT bo_no , bo_date , bo_title , bo_cnt FROM board WHERE bd_se = '02' ORDER BY bo_date DESC ) A
WHERE ROWNUM >= 1 AND ROWNUM <= 4

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT bo_no , bo_date , bo_title , bo_cnt FROM board WHERE bd_se = '01' ORDER BY bo_date DESC ) A
WHERE ROWNUM >= 1 AND ROWNUM <= 4
